requirements.description: You must have a privacy policy that complies with all applicable laws and industry standards.
You must post your privacy policy conspicuously within your application, in any store, and on any website where the application may be acquired.
Your privacy policy must inform users about the use of tracking technologies that collect, use, share, and store data, including precise location data.
Your privacy policy should contain a link to Flurry’s Privacy Policy and describe how users can learn more about their choices regarding Flurry’s use of User Data.

Your privacy policy should provide users with information on how to opt-out of targeted advertising on a device-by-device basis and include active links to Flurry’s Privacy Dashboard and other relevant opt-out resources.
You must obtain all necessary end-user consents required by applicable law before using the Services.
You must comply with all applicable laws, policies, and regulations relating to the collection, usage, and sharing of information from users.
